document.full_text: president obama hailed the auto industry's comeback at a chrysler plant in toledo, two years after the company's bailout, but warned that "headwinds" continue to buffet the economy.
document.title: obama hails auto industry's turnaround in visit to chrysler plant
lines_and_colors: president obama hailed the auto industry's comeback at a chrysler plant in toledo, two years after the company's bailout, but warned that "headwinds" continue to buffet the economy.
